item.title: A simple neural net in numpy
item.description: Now that we have seen how to build a neural net in pytorch, let's try to take it a step further and try to do the same thing in numpy.

item.title: How Do You Find A Good Learning Rate
item.description: This is the main hyper-parameter to set when we train a neural net, but how do you determine the best value? Here's a technique to quickly decide on one.
item.dc:creator: Sylvain Gugger

item.title: A Neural Net In Pytorch
item.description: The theory is all really nice, but let's actually build a neural net and train it! We'll see how a simple neural net with one hidden layer can learn to recognize digits very efficiently.
item.dc:creator: Sylvain Gugger

item.title: What Is Deep Learning?
item.description: What is deep learning? It's a class of algorithms where you train something called a neural net to complete a specific task. Let's begin with a general overview and we will dig into the details in subsequent articles.
item.dc:creator: Sylvain Gugger
